item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:

Orange Ale House

517 Boston Post Rd (Route 1) Orange, CT

Orange Ale House is a great neighborhood place located in Orange CT.  Great food that includes both bar regulars and some special items (can you say...lobster grilled cheese?? It's so good, it'll make you want to give up: men, women, chocolate, sunshine...enter in desirable object here...)

 

From 6-7pm please enjoy their regular awesome specials:

$4 House Wine

$4 House Cocktails

$2.50 Bud/Light Draft; Miller Light bottles

$11 Shock Top Pitchers

$13 Sam Adams Pitchers

 

Please RSVP, for Happy Hour Events if you're only a Maybe please put this in your comment.

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: You can contact the listed Host and/or we're most likely one of the largest groups at the Bar on a Monday.
item.name: Mon. 10/15 - Happy Hour: Orange Ale House, Orange CT
